project1.title: Simplified Minecraft Development with ThreeJS
bullets: Spearheaded the development of a simplified version of Minecraft using ThreeJS, incorporating key features such as procedural terrain generation, dynamic chunk loading, and mesh instancing to optimize performance.
Applied Perlin noise algorithms for procedural terrain generation, enhancing user experience through realistic landscapes and seamless world exploration.
Engineered efficient mesh instancing techniques to minimize render calls, resulting in smoother gameplay and improved graphical performance.
Implemented intuitive player interactions with the environment by integrating physics for block manipulation and user-friendly UI for material selection.
Contributed to the creation of a seamless user experience by developing a simple UI for material cycling and integrating crosshair functionality for precise block placement.
